mapper.insert: insert into travel_group (travel_Title, start_Date, end_Date) values(#{travel_Title}, #{start_Date} , #{end_Date})
mapper.select: select group_Code from travel_group where travel_Title = #{travel_Title} and start_Date = #{start_Date} and end_Date = #{end_Date}
mapper.insert: insert into travel_list (travel_Date, place_code, group_Code) values(#{travel_Date}, #{place_code} , #{group_Code})
